name: Night at the Arcade
description:
It’s 2001, your mom needs to do her nails and possibly run more errands. She’s dropped you off in the closest arcade she could think of so you can have something to do in the meantime. You have 10 minutes to play as many games as you can, accruing enough tickets to leave with the biggest prize in the arcade. 

Features

  • First-person VR experience
  • Multiple fun and playable arcade games like whac-a-mole and skiiball
  • Quirky characters like an arcade manager who only interacts with you through an old CRT television
